description: Amazon Linux 2 CIS Benchmark v3.0.0 - Section 5.3 Configure Integrity Checking

controls.title: Ensure AIDE is installed
controls.description: AIDE (Advanced Intrusion Detection Environment) is a file and directory integrity checker.
controls.remediation: Run the following command to install AIDE: # yum install aide

controls.title: Ensure filesystem integrity is regularly checked
controls.description: Regular filesystem integrity checks help detect unauthorized changes.
controls.remediation: Initialize AIDE database: # aide --init && mv /var/lib/aide/aide.db.new.gz /var/lib/aide/aide.db.gz. Create a cron job: 0 5 * * * /usr/sbin/aide --check
